verses.verse: {A Davidic Song of Ascents} {Hope in the Lord} d Lord , my heart is not arrogant, nor do I look haughty. I do not aspire {Lit. walk} to great things, nor concern myself with things beyond my ability.
Instead, I have composed and quieted myself like a weaned child with its mother; I am like a weaned child.
Place your hope in the Lord , Israel, both now and forever.
